name: Hit-Otsu
description:
Controls (Gamepad Supported):

WASD/Arrows/Left Stick to move
Mouse/Right Stick to Aim
Mouse1/A to Fire
Scroll/Shoulder Buttons to Change Weapon

Weapons (Careful with these, you've only got one shot of each):

  • Missile - Destroys everything in it's path
  • Freeze - Stops nearby enemies from moving
  • Laser- Vaporizes everything in your line of sight
